name: Add new Digistore24 payments to Google Sheets
description: Every time a new payment has been completed in Digistore24, Make will automatically add a payment to a specified spreadsheet in Google Sheets. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Z5rMAPIyjbD-gENE0hk4HB0XvJysj1bjxzMejwqDr5E/edit?usp=sharing).
